title: Himachal Pradesh HC directs EIH to vacate Wildflower Hall luxury hotel in Mashobra
description: Ahead of the court's order, the Himachal Pradesh government had argued that since EIH had failed to comply with the direction of the arbitral award of July 23, 2005, the state government had decided to resume the 'Wild Flower Hall' property and take its possession in terms of the award.
